name: places/ChIJf6shHltYwokRO7dgPn4PV08
adrFormatAddress: 787 11th Ave, New York, NY 10019-3538, USA

originalText.text:
My favorite place ever !!!

On my 3rd vehicle with Jaguar and I’m just a fan!!

From sales to service! Just an amazing experience.

Frank at Sales is just amazing and always available even on his day off. Got me the best deal and is very understanding!

Javier is just the KING at service. He always accommodate and willing to work around my crazy schedule. It is truly a pleasure to deal with you guys !!

My experience so far has been nothing but spectacular.

Thank you !!

originalText.text:
I recently had a disappointing experience with the Land Rover service department. Brought my car in for a diagnostic, but the process was slow and communication was lacking. The staff seemed unorganized, and it took longer than expected to get any updates on my vehicle's status. Overall, a frustrating experience that left me questioning the efficiency of their service department. My dissatisfaction with the Land Rover service department deepened when, after being assured my car was ready for pickup, I found myself stranded less than 24 hours later. The engine light illuminated, and my car wouldn't start, casting doubt on the accuracy of their diagnostic and leaving me with an inconvenient and unexpected breakdown. The lack of reliability in their service is concerning and has significantly impacted my trust in their capabilities. For context I have a 2020 Range Rover sport with 32k miles

Update

After my review, I have been in contact with Javier. He, along with his colleague Shelly, are actively addressing my concerns and working towards ensuring my car receives the correct service. They are also arranging for a loaner, demonstrating a commitment to rectifying the situation and minimizing further inconvenience. I appreciate their efforts to resolve the issues and hope for a smoother resolution moving forward.

originalText.text: Excellent, timely, and got me exactly what I wanted.. the color, interior etc. Not pushy at all for me to take any truck. In fact he specifically said, “get the car you really want, don’t rush, or settle. “ and then he worked lightning fast to find the truck in my color combo. I had it at my home within 3 days. Follow through afterwards was on point as well. Very happy. Highly recommend

originalText.text: My experience was wonderful, I first went in for someone to help me with the Land Rover  remote app within mins it was working. I had a few questions about a few upgrades to my truck then I was introduce to Catherine who was the best, she was so helpful I was able to get all my upgrades schedule that day and completed within a wk as promised.

originalText.text: This place was great.  A pleasure to work with Fitz and the team at Land Rover Manhattan.  Their sales team was kind and helpful, and we love our new Defender.
